DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate clinical performance two silicone-hydrogel contact lens .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Comparison Two Silicone-Hydrogel Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: The subject must least 18 less equal 39 year age need vision correction eye . The subject must require lens power 1.00 6.00D 1.00D corneal cylinder . The subject , base his/her knowledge , must good general health . The subject must able willing adhere instruction set forth protocol complete specify evaluation . Subject must current adapted daily wearer soft contact lenses least 6 month CL wear . Subject must agree wear contact lenses eye daily wear schedule least 8 hour per day every day study . Subject must willing able use care system lubricate drop provide study 4 week period . The subject must read , indicate understanding sign Informed Consent Form . The subject rigid gas permeable ( RGP ) daily disposable lens wearer . The presence clinically significant ( grade 3 4 ) anterior segment abnormality ; inflammation iritis ; infection eye , lid associate structure . The presence ocular systemic disease need medication might interfere contact lens wear would cause lens remove twice day . ( i.e. , Sjogren 's syndrome , type II diabetes , etc . ) Slit lamp finding would contraindicate contact lens wear : pathological dry eye associate finding pterygium corneal scar within visual axis neovascularization equal great 1mm limbus history giant papillary conjunctivitis ( GPC ) bad grade 2 anterior uveitis iritis ( past present ) seborrhoeic eczema seborrhoeic conjunctivitis A history recurrent erosion , corneal infiltrates , corneal ulcer fungal infection . A known history corneal hypoesthesia ( reduced corneal sensitivity ) . Contact lens snellen visual acuity ( VA ) bad 20/30 . Aphakia , keratoconus highly irregular cornea . Current pregnancy lactation ( best subject 's knowledge ) Any active participation another clinical study time study .
